metadata_description: Well Keeper is a Bullet Hell Shoot `Em Up game where you move by flapping. Battle waves of enemies, upgrade unique and unexpected abilities and become immensely powerful.
metadata_ogTitle: Well Keeper - a game by Corporate Potato
metadata_ogDescription: Well Keeper is a Bullet Hell Shoot `Em Up game where you move by flapping.
metadata_twitterTitle: Well Keeper - a game by Corporate Potato
metadata_twitterDescription: Well Keeper is a Bullet Hell Shoot `Em Up game where you move by flapping.
metadata_images_alt: Well Keeper key art and logo
description: Well Keeper is a Bullet Hell Shoot `Em Up where you move by flapping. Battle waves of enemies, upgrade unique and unexpected abilities and become immensely powerful.

features_body.title: Distinctive Flap-Style Movement
features_body.text: Master movement in this unique twist on the genre. You control a mouse that flaps its ears left or right — flap rapidly to gain height or slowly to descend. You can also dash sideways to dodge tricky projectiles. This elegant control scheme is easy to learn, yet offers expressive, skillful movement.

features_body.title: Intense Bullet Hell
features_body.text: Fight increasingly difficult enemy waves, each unique and with a different attack. You’ll be on the edge of your seat through 30 distinct waves across three levels. Every encounter is tense, unpredictable, and packed with action.

features_body.title: A Variety of Upgrades
features_body.text: Collect coins from defeated enemies to upgrade 24 different properties and unique abilities called “Wishes.” These include powerful new weapons, economic effects, weapon modifiers, stat boosts, and more, fueling a strong progression curve.

features_body.title: Epic Boss Battles
features_body.text: Conquer huge bosses at the end of each level. With layered attack patterns and multiple phases, these extended battles deliver a distinct challenge beyond regular enemy waves.

features_body.title: Immense Power Trip
features_body.text: When defeated, you lose your coins and restart from the beginning of the level, but keep your acquired Wishes. This makes you more powerful each time you begin a new run, creating a thrilling sense of exponential domination.

about_paragraphs: Corporate Potato is an independent game developer based in Sweden with a background in creative arts. He has worked in the games industry in various roles for game studios such as Fast Travel Games and Might & Delight.
